source.package: * Compare: an interface to enable users to define the result of * a comparison of two objects. * @author Sunita Mani */ package sun.misc
source.javadoc:
Compare: an interface to enable users to define the result of a comparison of two objects.
Sunita Mani

interface.name: Compare
interface.javadoc:
doCompare
obj1 first object to compare.
obj2 second object to compare.
-1 if obj1 < obj2, 0 if obj1 == obj2, 1 if obj1 > obj2.
